metadata.name: Account Lockout
metadata.comment: Identifies user account which has been locked because the user tried to sign in too many times with an incorrect user ID or password.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (CAST(status_id AS INT) = CAST(50053 AS INT))

output.summary: Identifies user account which has been locked because the user tried to sign in too many times with an incorrect user ID or password.
